page.title: 17Rodbourne School
page.content: The old school at {Rodbourne}was built in 1840.It is a Cotswold stone and tiled building.The oak porch beams are carved with acorns and the words "Hearken unto me and I will teach you the fear of the Lord". The school closed in 1973 and the children transferred to{Seagry school. The building,owned by Sir John Pollen was let to sculptor{Simon Verity}and his family.Part of Mr.Verity's job is to restore stone carvings,he has worked on Exeter and Wells Cathedrals. In 1984 he was commissioned to make a stone sculpture of{St.Peter for the {apex of the west front of Exeter {Cathedral.}Mr.Verity designs sculptures for people and carves memorial plaques.He loves to make statues and ornaments for gardens especially for grottoes.
